subject:
Re: [cc-community] Wikitravel wins Webby Award for Best Travel
	Website
body:
Congrats!FOn 5/1/07, Evan Prodromou <evan@prodromou.name> wrote:
On Tue, 2007-10-04 at 12:53 -0400, Evan Prodromou wrote:> Hi, everyone. I wanted to point out that Wikitravel has been nominated> for a Webby Award in the Travel CategoryI wanted to follow up on this to let people know that the Webby winners
were announced today, and Wikitravel won for Best Travel Website.Thanks to all for your support.-Evan________________________________________________________________________Evan Prodromou <
evan@prodromou.name>http://evan.prodromou.name/_______________________________________________cc-community mailing list
cc-community@lists.ibiblio.orghttp://lists.ibiblio.org/mailman/listinfo/cc-community
